casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Frank MCGEE Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 21, 2017

Stephanie L. Evans, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Ronald G. Wetter, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn. App. 566, 168 A.3d 495 (2017), is denied.
